lines: 1. All to Jesus I surrender, All to Him I freely give; I will ever love and trust Him, In His presence daily live;
Refrain : I surrender all, I surrender all; All to Thee, my blessed Saviour, I surrender all.
2. All to Jesus I surrender; Humbly at His feet I bow, Worldly pleasures all forsaken; Take me, Jesus, take me now;
3. All to Jesus I surrender, Make me, Saviour, wholly Thine; Let me feel the Holy Spirit, Truly know that Thou art mine.
4. All to Jesus I surrender; Now I feel the sacred flame. O the joy of full salvation! Glory, glory to His name!
